g.text: the id : is the primary Key
menestraul_end_date - this will be taken from the time the user has filled
the form and submitted the menestraul duration period
once the period is submitted the system will calculate no of days from the start to the end
when it gets the date it will fill it tp the end date
when person logs into the app the system to know days remaining it will take the end date minus the now date time
when the user fills the not remember
we assumes that the user start menestraul date id today
so we give average menestraul date to 28days
then calculate from todat till 28days the day after 28days we place in the database
now when the user opens the appp we call api that calculated dates..
it will take today minus last day then give the user a day remaining
